intro: Psychotria aubletiana var. villipila, commonly known as the violet psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, violet-colored flowers and elliptical, dark green leaves. It typically grows as an understory plant in humid, shaded forest environments. Due to its ornamental value and potential medicinal properties, it is sometimes cultivated in botanical gardens.
